# init(associationKind:)

**Initializer**

Creates a group activity association interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(associationKind: GroupActivityAssociationKind?)
```

## Parameters

- **kind**: If provided, the kind of group activity association.
title: init(associationKind:)
